function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Soils absorbing viruses from aerosols and water, contributing to the spread of SARS-CoV-2 in exterior environments.","Impact":"Increased risk of outdoor transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other viral infections.","Mitigation":"Implement soil management practices to reduce viral absorption, improve outdoor ventilation, and promote safe outdoor gatherings.","Technologies":"Soil remediation technologies, outdoor air filtration systems, and urban planning for safe outdoor spaces.","People":"Residents in densely populated areas, urban planners, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Urban planners, environmental agencies, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Potential secondary transmission of viruses through aerosolization in built environments.","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor transmission of viral infections, including SARS-CoV-2.","Mitigation":"Enhance indoor air filtration systems, implement ventilation control measures, and promote indoor air quality monitoring.","Technologies":"HEPA filters, MERV-13 filtration systems, indoor air purification devices, and building management systems.","People":"Residents in built environments, building owners, and facility managers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management companies, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Gaps in filter edges contributing to system failures in removing pathogens from shared air environments, impacting transmission of infections.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of air filtration systems in mitigating the transmission of pathogens, including COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and inspection of air filtration systems, use of high-quality filter materials, and sealing gaps for better air filtration.","Technologies":"Advanced filter sealing techniques, remote monitoring systems for filter performance, and automated filter maintenance systems.","People":"Healthcare facility staff, building maintenance personnel, and occupants in shared indoor spaces.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management, building maintenance teams, and facilities management companies."}]}
